value:
$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|Finally... Alone.$k$pWhy do these humans insist on
calling upon me? In the middle of
this foolish festival, no less.$k$pSomething isn't right... Is it because
of the summoning? I still have my
powers, but...$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|Robin? Is that you?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|You?$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|So you were summoned to this
festival, were you? That's good.
I hope you enjoy yourself!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|Fool! To think that I would enjoy
this...frivolity...$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|Hah! Take a look at yourself!
In a costume like that, you're
far from convincing, friend.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|I... I did not choose this garb.$k$pI am not the Robin that you know.
You would do well to keep your
distance, human.$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|Hey, Robin! Wait a minute!$k$p

$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|So this is where you went. I've been
looking all over for you.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|Everywhere I go, offensive
festivities. And as for you, please...
do not concern yourself with me. I...$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|I understand. You're not my Robin.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|You know this? Then why...$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|There are others of me here too.
I can tell—our worlds are rather
different, aren't they?$k$pI don't know a thing about your
world, but if you have even a little
bit of Robin's heart in there...$k$pNo matter which Robin you are,
here in Askr, you are my friend.$k$pWe're two halves of a whole...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|Pretty words... Which have no
effect on me as I am. They fall
flat.$k$pIf not for the contract with the
summoner, I could even kill you
now... As I did then.$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|As you did when?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|I can see that you do not understand.
In my world, you are dead...$k$pI betrayed you, and drove this very
hand through your heart.$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|And then what happened?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|...$k$pYou looked at me...your murderer...
and said, "It's not your fault."$k$pSo tender. So nauseating. I was
overcome...$k$pOvercome with hatred.$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|Does a shred of the me who
shared a bond with you exist in
my heart, beyond Grima's reach?$k$pHoping against hope...is pointless.$k$pDo not speak to me again. I do not
wish to recall these feelings...$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|Robin...$k$p
